uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.logging

Interface LoggerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextService<LoggerService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferLoggerService, CommandLineLoggerService, CommonsLoggerService, DebugLoggerService, EmailLoggerService, Log4JLoggerService, PrintLoggerService, ServletEmailLoggerService

    public interface LoggerService
extends AppContextService<LoggerService>
    A service to provide logging capabilities. 
       uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.Logger log = c.getService(LoggerService.class).getLogger(getClass()); // gets logger for this class
   log.debug("A debug message");
   log.error("A error message");
    Logger is a locally defined interface. In a servlet context this is usually a wrapper round a Log4J Logger class. However in a stand-alone context a the Logger just prints to System.out This is to allow lightweight applications to run without the full Log4J jar files and makes it easier to switch to a different logging system.
    Author:
    spb
